name: Jumba
description:
Jumba is a bottom-up infinite-runner game.

You can run it on your mobile browser.

Rules: You must run from the lava below you. Avoid fireballs and get clock watches to reduce the lava speed. The more you run, more score you'll get.

Controls: Left/Right arrow on keyboard or touch on the left/right side of your smartphone screen.

This is a game that me and a friend made at college in 2015 as part of a "make a game in a week" challenge. 

All assets used here are found on the internet. 

Have fun :)
